trans-unit.source: Builds the service behavior for the workflow service that it decorates.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The WorkflowServiceAttributes class is used to define service attributes for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity.
Some of the attributes have default values, as shown below.

||| |-|-| |Attribute|Default Value| |AddressFilterMode|Exact| |IgnoreExtensionDataObject|False| |IncludeExceptionDetailInFault|False| |MaxItemsInObjectGraph|2147483647| |UseSynchronizationContext|True| |ValidateMustUnderstand|True|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowServiceAttributes"></xref> class.
This constructor is typically called when the parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ReceiveActivity> activity is created.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> enumeration that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
The default value is `AddressFilterMode.Exact`.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> enumeration value that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
Gets or sets the value used to locate the service element in an application configuration file.
The default value is null.
The value to locate in the configuration file.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.
The default value is `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail> and sent as a fault message.
Set this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> only during development to troubleshoot a service.
The default value is `false`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.
The default value is <xref:System.Int32>.
The maximum number of items allowed in an object.
Gets or sets the value of the name attribute in the service element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
This property corresponds to the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported.
The default value is null.
The value of the Name property.
Gets or sets the value of the target namespace for the service in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
This value corresponds to the value of the `targetNamespace` attribute for the <`wsdl:definitions`> element that contains the <`wsdl:service`> element when exported.
The default value is null.
The value of the Namespace property.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.
The default value is `true`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> header processing.
The default value is `true`.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system is to perform SOAP header <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> processing; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the application performs this processing.
